name: Halloween: Trick or Treat
synopsis: Go “Trick or Treating” with Mike and Sally in this fun packed, all-action Halloween game. Collect lots of Treats and even get Tricked along the way. Bump into Friendly Ghosts, Wicked Witches, Scary Skulls & Flapping Bats! Explore the Haunted House of a nutty professor. Get trapped in...then escape from a Witch’s House in the Pumpkin Forest. Play the game over and over to get a higher score than your family and friends...but be careful you don’t get Tricked too often...ha ha ha haaaaaah!
